Templates.template:
new sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		blocked: ${bBlocked}, // boolean
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: ${[]}, // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		value: ${""}, // string
		type: ${"javascript"}, // string
		width: ${"100%"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		height: ${"100%"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		editable: ${bEditable}, // boolean
		lineNumbers: ${bLineNumbers}, // boolean
		valueSelection: ${bValueSelection}, // boolean
		maxLines: ${0}, // int
		colorTheme: ${"default"}, // string
		syntaxHints: ${bSyntaxHints}, // boolean
		liveChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		change: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new CodeEditor. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getValue value} : string (default: )
    • {@link #getType type} : string (default: javascript)
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: 100%)
    • {@link #getHeight height} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: 100%)
    • {@link #getEditable editable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getLineNumbers lineNumbers} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getValueSelection valueSelection} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getMaxLines maxLines} : int (default: 0)
    • {@link #getColorTheme colorTheme} : string (default: default)
    • {@link #getSyntaxHints syntaxHints} : boolean (default: true)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:liveChange liveChange} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:change change} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor
Templates.helpDescription: Allows to visualize source code of various types with syntax highlighting, line numbers in editable and read only mode. Use this controls in scenarios where the user should be able to inspect and edit source code. NOTE: There is a known limitation where CodeEditor won't work within IconTabBar on Internet Explorer. There is a way to achieve the same functionality - an example of IconTabHeader and a CodeEditor can be found in the CodeEditor's samples.

Templates.name: sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor.fireChange
Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:change change} to attached listeners.

Templates.name: sap.ui.codeeditor.CodeEditor.fireLiveChange
Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:liveChange liveChange} to attached listeners.
